verses.name: Numbers 28:17
verses.text: And in the fifteenth day of this month is the feast: seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.

verses.name: Numbers 28:18
verses.text: In the first day shall be an holy convocation; ye shall do no manner of servile work therein:

verses.name: Numbers 28:19
verses.text: But ye shall offer a sacrifice made by fire for a burnt offering unto the Lord; two young bullocks, and one ram, and seven lambs of the first year: they shall be unto you without blemish:

verses.name: Numbers 28:20
verses.text: And their meat offering shall be of flour mingled with oil: three tenth deals shall ye offer for a bullock, and two tenth deals for a ram;
